title: "Experts call for ethically responsible AI solutions"
excerpt: "Joint efforts have been put forward by academics, researchers and government authorities to call for reliable and ethically responsible artificial intelligence solutions. An LLM is one of the hottest types of AI algorithm that uses deep-learning tools and large data sets to understand, summarize, generate and predict new content."
